p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_78: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_96: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_99: Our program includes rotations at Washington Hospital Center, Georgetown University Hospital, Children's National Hospital, and the NIH. We have a diverse patient population base with a wealth of interesting and complex cases. Our residents are a close-knit group that work hard and enjoy fulfilling personal time in a wonderful city with access to some of the greatest cultural and historical sites in the nation, There is also generous support for research endeavors and attendance at conferences.

p_348: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
